main.name: Jared Lim
main.description: I am obsessed with user experience and love to create clean, intuitive, and fun-to-use websites
main.bio: I am outgoing, dedicated, and open-minded. I love to leverage technology to bring personal experiences to thousands of people at the same time. I am happy knowing that users liked the 'feel' of an app and take pride in helping them solve their problems in an intuitive and modern way.
main.contactmessage: Let's chat. Shoot me an email.

resume.skillmessage: I'm skilled with a variety of languages, applications, and tools

education.description: Learned how to build dynamic end-to-end applications.
Worked with phonetic and phoneme information to create and manage corpus databases.
Operations, accounting, finance, and general management.

work.title: Founder
work.description: Work with local doulas to created an automated postpartum education system.

work.title: Customer Education Specialist
work.description: Automated internal and customer facing education, training, and operations.

testimonials.text: Would definitely recommend working with Jared! He was great to work with and delivered an amazing update to our product's documentation! His thoughtful insights were appreciated and he met all deadlines and communicated clearly.
Jared can take any system and break it down into its smallest components only to build it back better.
